title: Motorist Killed in Chelmsford
maintext:
CHELMSFORD -- A 23-year-old area man was killed in a single car crash on Main Street Tuesday night.
According to Lt. Jason Hanscom, the vehicle the man was driving veered off of Main Street in the area of Burton Lane and crashed into a tree around 11 p.m.
Hanscom said the man was the only occupant of the vehicle.
The crash remains under investigation. No other details were immediately available.
Follow Alana Melanson at facebook.com/alana.lowellsun or on Twitter @alanamelanson.
